title: The Secret Dragon
description: How To Train Your Dragon meets The Indian in the Cupboard in this funny, heartfelt story of friendship, family and timeless adventure.When would-be palaeontologist Mari finds a tiny dragon while out fossil hunting on a Welsh beach, she knows it's a discovery that could change science - and her life - forever.Mari wants to make a scientific study of the baby reptile that will astound the world. But this dragon doesn't want to be studied, it wants to be free. And although it may only be pocket sized, it has a giant appetite for mischief...
author: E.J. Clarke
